ModMetaData.name: Crackhead King Trader
ModMetaData.author: Fufulog
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an Orbital Trader called the Crackhead King. Sells drugs, strange wares and burritos. AKA the loot table of your local crackhead king if he were a "Dungeons and Dragons" enemy.
Adds a large amount of drugs: 1. 5 kinds of alcohol 2. 5 kinds of tobacco products 3. 2 edibles and vapes 4. MANY hard drugs (some are beneficial only) 5. Gloves, Shoes and Socks 6. 3 kinds of smeltable scraps 7. 2 new bionic implants 8. Some rare items and buildings sold only by the trader 9. Requires VFE core for apparell hediffs.
Items found are based entirely on this list and meme: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56boQOgekas
Source: https://github.com/josephquesnel/CrackheadKingTrader
